title: A rare case study of pyoderma gangrenosum with dilated cardiomyopathy and multiple cerebral infarct in malnourished children
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Riyadi Adrizain, Putria Rayani, Putie Hapsari, Vita Indriasari, Karina Desiana, Anggraini Alam, Djatnika Setiabudi, Alex Chairulfatah
